ENTITIES.SUBJECT: Subject Line

HELP.DASHBOARD: Welcome to your virtual desk! Here you can see a summary of the entire system. Use the 'Customize' button to choose which tables you want to keep an eye on. The numbers you see indicate how many items have been entered in total.
HELP.ENTITIES: On this page, you design the 'skeleton' of your database. Here you decide what data you want to collect (e.g., Name, Email, Price). Once an entity is created, it will appear in the menu to allow you to enter the actual data.
HELP.USERS: Colleague management: here you create accounts for those who need to use the site. When you add a user, the system generates a secure password and sends it to them via email. You can also block access to a user if necessary.
HELP.GROUPS: Groups are used to give different permissions to people. For example, you can create an 'Editors' group that can change data and an 'Readers' group that can only view it. Groups with an 'ADMIN' role can also manage these settings.
HELP.EMAIL_TEMPLATES: Here you prepare the letters that the system sends automatically. You can use placeholders like {{name}} that will be replaced by actual data at the time of sending. It's useful for order confirmations or system alerts.
HELP.MENU_SETUP: Organize the buttons in the sidebar. You can decide which tables to show users and in what order. You can also create 'subgroups' to keep everything tidy.
HELP.FILES: This is your file warehouse. Here you can upload images or documents you want to use in the system. Each file has a unique address and is saved securely.
HELP.SETTINGS: Change the look of your portal! Here you can upload your company logo, change the name at the top, and choose the base language. It is the heart of White Label personalization.
HELP.RECORDS: This is the list of data entered. You can search for a specific item, sort them by date, or modify them. Remember that every change is tracked if you have activated 'History' in the entity.

FIELDS_HELP.ENTITY_KEY: The 'technical' name of the table (e.g., 'customers'). It must be a single word without spaces.
FIELDS_HELP.DISPLAY_LABEL: The 'pretty' name that everyone will see (e.g., 'My Customers').
FIELDS_HELP.HISTORY_TRACKING: If enabled, the system will track who changed the data and when, allowing you to go back in time.
FIELDS_HELP.FIELD_NAME: The name of this data column (e.g., 'Price', 'Address').
FIELDS_HELP.DATA_TYPE: What kind of data do you want to put in? (Text, Number, Date, Email...).
FIELDS_HELP.FIELD_REQUIRED: If enabled, the user cannot save if they leave this space empty.
FIELDS_HELP.REF_ENTITY: Choose another table to link data (e.g., link a Product to a Category).
FIELDS_HELP.ACL_WRITE: Who can create or change this data?
FIELDS_HELP.ACL_DELETE: Who can permanently delete this data?
FIELDS_HELP.ACL_SEARCH: Who can use the search bar on this table?
FIELDS_HELP.NOTIF_RECIPIENTS: The emails to send an alert to (e.g., orders@my-site.com).
FIELDS_HELP.NOTIF_SUBJECT: The title of the email that will arrive.
FIELDS_HELP.NOTIF_TEMPLATE: Choose which 'ready-made letter' to use for this alert.
FIELDS_HELP.USER_USERNAME: The name the colleague will use to enter the site.
FIELDS_HELP.USER_EMAIL: The email where we'll send the password and notifications.
FIELDS_HELP.USER_ENABLED: If disabled, the colleague will no longer be able to enter the site.
FIELDS_HELP.USER_GROUPS: Choose which groups this person belongs to to give them permissions.
FIELDS_HELP.GROUP_ROLE: If you choose ADMIN, this group will be able to change site settings!
FIELDS_HELP.TEMPLATE_NAME: A name to recognize this letter (e.g., 'Welcome New Users').
FIELDS_HELP.TEMPLATE_HTML: Here you write the text of the letter. You can use HTML code to make it pretty!
FIELDS_HELP.APP_NAME: The name of your company or project that appears at the top.
FIELDS_HELP.LOGO_URL: The address of your logo image.
FIELDS_HELP.THEME_SELECT: Choose the main color of the site.
FIELDS_HELP.LAYOUT_DESKTOP: How you want the menu when using a large Computer.
FIELDS_HELP.LAYOUT_TABLET: How you want the menu on a Tablet.
FIELDS_HELP.LAYOUT_MOBILE: How you want the menu on a Mobile phone.
FIELDS_HELP.SENDER_EMAIL: The email that will appear as the sender when the system sends messages.
FIELDS_HELP.THEME_PRIMARY: The main color of buttons and titles.
FIELDS_HELP.THEME_ACCENT: A bright color to highlight important things.
FIELDS_HELP.THEME_TEXT: The color of the text (make sure it's readable on the background!).
FIELDS_HELP.THEME_BG: The background color of the whole site.
FIELDS_HELP.THEME_SURFACE: The color of cards and menus.
FIELDS_HELP.MENU_LABEL: The name that will appear in the menu (e.g., 'Customers').
FIELDS_HELP.MENU_ENTITY: Choose which table should open when you click this item.
FIELDS_HELP.MENU_POSITION: The order in which it will appear (low numbers at top, high numbers at bottom).
FIELDS_HELP.MENU_ICON: Choose an icon to make the menu look better and easier to recognize.
FIELDS_HELP.MENU_PARENT: If you want this item to be 'inside' another one (like a submenu), choose it here.
FIELDS_HELP.ACTION_SAVE: Click here to save all the changes you've made.
FIELDS_HELP.ACTION_DELETE: Warning: this will delete the data forever!
FIELDS_HELP.ACTION_EDIT: Open the page to change this item's data.
FIELDS_HELP.ACTION_CREATE: Create a new item from scratch.
FIELDS_HELP.ACTION_LOGOUT: Log out of the site safely.
FIELDS_HELP.ACTION_SEARCH: Type here to quickly find what you're looking for.
FIELDS_HELP.ACTION_ADD: Add a new piece to the list.
